entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
